physical_appearance:This is a photograph of the town of Rajouri
 in Kashmir. There is a river running through the left to the front-right of the photograph. Beside the river bank
 there is a small town
 with concrete buildings amongst the vegetation. There are several hill-tops in the background. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of the town of Rajouri, in Kashmir. There is a river running through the left to the front-right of the photograph. Beside the river bank, there is a small town, with concrete buildings amongst the vegetation. There are several hill-tops in the background. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
